content.prompt: Which of the following most likely accounts for the limits of United States settlement in portions of North Carolina and Georgia depicted on the map?

choices.label: Tobacco and sugarcane crops failed to thrive in those areas.
American Indians maintained sovereign control over those regions.
The Northwest Ordinance prohibited slavery in those regions.
The lands were set aside for American Indian reservations.

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain how a specific historical development or process is situated within a broader historical context.
